cause.description:
Please join this cause to pledge to do something strange today. Bark at someone. Give twenty bucks to a rich guy. Eat a sammich and yell that tofu is people. Create some sort of earth-shattering flatulence at a political event. Guerrilla Ontology, baby!
1. Thou shalt not covet thy neighbour's ass
2. Thou shalt not covet thy neighbour's hot sexy legs either
cause.name: Sink
